creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text: There are two points, I have to mention: 1.) In the above file the class path is not build correctly. The first two jars are lost due to a missing %CP%; in the second classpath line. So the ant.jar file is not found by the compiler. 2.) There are problems when using path names containing spaces (as a former Unix user I know it is a don't :-). But I placed Tomcat below ...\Apache Group\Tomcat and javac terminates the Classpath immediately behing the first blank. This is also true for the env var TOMCAT_HOME. These features are also contained in the documentation page.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: The %CP% bug has been fixed.  Spaces in path names are a known issue.
